verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> for I have <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that I may <S%H7896>show<s%> these my <S%H226>signs<s%> in their <S%H7130>midst,<s%>

and that you may <S%H5608>tell<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and of your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> what things I have <S%H5953>done<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and my <S%H226>signs<s%> which I have <S%H7760>done<s%> among <S%H3045>them;<s%> that you may know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "This is what Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H4970><s%> 'How long will you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5971>me?<s%> Let my people <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>

Or <S%H3588>else,<s%> if you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H4279>behold,<s%> tomorrow I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> into your <S%H1366>country,<s%>

and they shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so that one <S%H3201>won't<s%> be able to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of that which has <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> which <S%H7604>remains<s%> to you from the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> which <S%H6779>grows<s%> for you out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Your <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H1004>filled,<s%> and the houses of all your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of all the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> as neither your <S%H1>fathers<s%> nor your <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they were on the <S%H127>earth<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>'" He <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4170>him,<s%> "How long will this man be a snare to <S%H582>us?<s%> Let the men <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H2962>Don't<s%> you yet <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is <S%H6>destroyed?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were brought <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>them,<s%> "Go, <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> but who are those who will <S%H1980>go?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will <S%H3212>go<s%> with our <S%H5288>young<s%> and with our <S%H2205>old;<s%> with our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and with our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> with our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with our <S%H1241>herds<s%> will we <S%H3212>go;<s%> for we must hold a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "Yahweh be with you if I will let you <S%H7971>go<s%> with your little <S%H2945>ones!<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is clearly before your <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

Not <S%H3212>so!<s%> Go now you who are <S%H1397>men,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for that is what you <S%H1245>desire!<s%>" They were driven <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> that they may come <S%H5927>up<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> even all that the <S%H1259>hail<s%> has <S%H7604>left.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5090>brought<s%> an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> all that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and all the <S%H3915>night;<s%> and when it was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5375>brought<s%> the <S%H697>locusts.<s%>

The <S%H697>locusts<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5117>rested<s%> in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> They were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous.<s%> <S%H6440>Before<s%> them there were no <S%H3651>such<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> as <S%H310>they,<s%> neither after them shall be such.

For they <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> and they <S%H398>ate<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> which the <S%H1259>hail<s%> had <S%H3498>left.<s%> There <S%H3498>remained<s%> <S%H3418>nothing<s%> <S%H6086>green,<s%> either tree or <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> through all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and against you.

Now therefore please <S%H5375>forgive<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H6471>again,<s%> and <S%H6279>pray<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that he may also take <S%H5493>away<s%> from me this <S%H4194>death.<s%>"
He went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6279>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> which took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> and <S%H8628>drove<s%> them into the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%> There <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H1121>didn't<s%> let the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> that there may be <S%H2822>darkness<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even <S%H2822>darkness<s%> which may be <S%H4959>felt.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and there was a <S%H653>thick<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

They <S%H7200>didn't<s%> see <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> neither did <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> from his place for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> but all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H216>light<s%> in their <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Only let your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H3322>stay<s%> <S%H2945>behind.<s%> Let your little ones also go with <S%H3212>you.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You must also <S%H5414>give<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>sacrifices<s%> and burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> that we may <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Our <S%H4735>livestock<s%> also shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H6541>us.<s%> Not a hoof shall be left <S%H7604>behind,<s%> for of it we must <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> and we <S%H3045>don't<s%> know with what we must <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> until we come <S%H935>there.<s%>"
But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> let them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Get away from <S%H8104>me!<s%> Be careful to <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> no <S%H3254>more;<s%> for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die!<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3651>well.<s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> again no <S%H3254>more.<s%>"
